fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Stalk two targets each night.
- Choose whether to activate overdrive or bloodlust. (coin ability)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you choose overdrive, you will attack both your targets if they win together.
- If you choose bloodlust, you will attack both your targets if they do not win together.
- You must wait a night after successfully killing players twice in a row.
